layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x66
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x66
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,24) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (-10,0) size 794x18 [color=#000080]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 299x18
          text run at (0,0) width 299: "  This page should have a horizontal scroll bar."
